document.full_text: trader glencore is set to price its record $11 billion market debut in the middle of its initial range, balancing appetite for its shares with concerns from some investors over valuation, sources familiar with the matter said.
document.title: glencore nears final straight in ipo
lines_and_colors: trader glencore is set to price its record $11 billion market debut in the middle of its initial range, balancing appetite for its shares with concerns from some investors over valuation, sources familiar with the matter said.
